modName: Milans Dungeon Pack 2  - Over 150 minutes of extra gameplay
summary:
You heard rumors about the temple of Alvzaro, a temple build by the dwarves.
The temple is the ultimate source of richdom, but it requires three keys to enter the temple.
Find the three keys, and enter the temple.

4 NEW DUNGEONS ADDED!
descriptionHtml:
EDIT 12 APRIL:
This mod reached 1k downloads at the exact same time that my first mod hit 3k! Thanks a lot everybody!

Welcome to my second dungeon pack for skyrim!
If you didn\'t see my first pack yet, link: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13969

VIDEO OF MY NEXT PROJECT:
[youtube]1W8sg-yGSuw[/youtube]

Check out my song!:
[youtube]KU6PzNevMgA[/youtube]
POSSIBLE CONFLICTING MODS:
Sounds Of Skyrim
Unofficial Patch for Skyrim (This conflicts with 90% of all dungeon mods)
Dynamic Torch Mod

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Trailer: www.youtube.com/watch?v=buBjSGTqf90
Locations: http://youtu.be/ZFRF66DneGI 

This dungeon pack adds 4 new dungeons to the world of skyrim, and contains a little background story. All dungeons are made for players with a level of at least 25+.
Estimated Time and level are calculated at Adept Difficulty.

STORY:

You heard rumors about the temple of Alvzaro, a temple build by the dwarves.
The temple is the ultimate source of richdom, but it requires three keys to enter the temple.
Find the three keys, and enter the temple.



DUNGEONS:


The Lost Tomb of Drofar:

Drofar\'s tomb is a old ancient tomb hidden inside a mountain.
The owner of the tomb is Drofar, a terrifying monster.
Drofar carries one of the three keys that are needed to access Alvzaro Temple.
This dungeon can be really creepy and is fairly long.
Estimated Level: 30+
Estimated Time: +/- 40 Minutes


Mines of Avanion:

The mines of Avanion used to be the main resource for Rorikstead but the Miners felt used and abused. They left the city and went to mine on their own to get rich. They found one of the keys to Alvzaro while mining for ore and they seem to still have the key.
Estimated Level: 25 +
Estimated Time: +/- 35 Minutes


Fort Hellsman:

Fort Hellsman used to be a glorious fort near Rorikstead, but is completly destroyed.
The basement of the fort is still pretty much intact and is being used by a group of Wizards. The wizards seem to have one of the keys.
Estimated Level: 25+
Estimated Time: +/- 30 Minutes


Alvzaro:

Alvzaro is a temple near Markath and is said to be full of richdom.
But as always, Richdom goes pared with Danger.
Alvzaro is locked and requires three keys to enter the temple.
This dungeon should be a challenge for everyone and is full of traps and loot.
Keep your eyes open.
Estimated Level: 35+ 
Estimated Time: +/- 35 Minutes



If you liked this dungeon pack please consider clicking \"Endore me\" and leave a comment!
IF you made a video about this dungeon pack you can send it to me on youtube or on Nexus and it might be in the description.
author: Milanosie
